title: Tech News: Supreme Court to Weigh In on Section 230
itunes:title: Tech News: Supreme Court to Weigh In on Section 230
description:
The US Supreme Court agreed to look at a case that involves Section 230, a rule that protects internet platform from being held liable for stuff posted by users. Plus news about Google Translate in China, a supertanker that is using sails to offset fuel consumption and whether a deepfake company really did purchase the likeness rights of Bruce Willis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The US Supreme Court agreed to look at a case that involves Section 230, a rule that protects internet platform from being held liable for stuff posted by users. Plus news about Google Translate in China, a supertanker that is using sails to offset fuel consumption and whether a deepfake company really did purchase the likeness rights of Bruce Willis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: Supreme Court, Section 230, safe harbor, privacy, China, Google, Google Translate, YouTube, algorithm, metaverse, Tim Cook, Apple, robocalls, advertising, marketing, YouTube Premium, ads, USB-C, iPhone, supertanker, sailing, sails, Bruce Willis, Deepfakes
